hints.content:
$\green{\text{Stars on China's flag}}+\pink{2}=\purple{\text{Stars on Tajikistan's flag}}$

$\green{5} + \pink{2} =\purple\Box$

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1c88418e044e47235e5ca275c051b8b5.png) $\qquad$ ![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9bd8b287e424ee8f967eb03ee39b0862.png)
There are $\purple{7}$ stars on the flag of Tajikistan.

question.content:
The flag of China, shown below, is red with $5$ stars.  It has $2$ fewer stars than the flag of Tajikistan.

**How many stars are on the flag of Tajikistan?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] stars

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1c88418e044e47235e5ca275c051b8b5.png)
